page.title: 24All change at the breweries; well two of them anyway
page.content:
John Smith's is now owned by Heineken and Bass Charrington runs under the Molson Coors umbrella. Both establishments have made massive investment in new buildings and equipment. Most brewing in large breweries is controlled by computer these days (10/10/2011). Sam Smiths is still run by the same family and continues to plough a fiercly independent furrow.
Contribution by: Peter Bradshaw
